name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, open christmas countdown”
”Alexa, start christmas countdown”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: You can now easily ask Alexa how many days until either Christmas Eve, or Christmas Day! She will then tell you an introductory and closing fun, short message.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
